jobDescription:
Responsibilities

  • Work closely with the rest of the software engineers in the team to design, build, test, deploy, maintain and continuously improve the company’s software solutions, including the core mobile point-of-sale (MPOS) system. Additionally, contribute to new product research projects, which may include research and the building of proofs-of-concept.
  • Work with the company’s clients in various countries to understand their requirements and help build customizations to the company’s software solutions that will meet their needs.
  • Mentor junior software engineers and provide guidance to them for their work as needed.

Requirements

1. Required:

  • 2 to 5 years of Java (core SE 8) experience.
  • Experience in DBs and DB manipulation (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, SQL).
  • Experience in RDMS, writing native SQL query.

2. Great to have:

  • Extensive skills and knowledge of Springboot 2, Vuejs, thymeleaf, JSP/Servlets, Spring, JPA and Hibernate.
  • Knowledge of Application Servers / Containers (Apache Web Server, WebSphere, WebLogic, JBoss WildFly, Jetty, Tomcat, Docker).
  • Knowledge of payment domain requirements and standards (EMV, PCI for example).

3. Added Advantages

  • Great understanding of software design (patterns) and debugging skills (using Eclipse, Netbeans, IntelliJ IDEA, etc).
  • Good communication skills, that is you can probably get along great with our clients and us.
  • Above all, great attitude and a deep desire to constantly learn and improve.

Benefits you might be interested

  • Medical & Insurance plan - At Soft Space, we believe in putting our employees first. Rest assured that we’ve got you covered.
  • Dental claim - Our dental coverage will take care of your pearly whites for you. After all, your smile is our pride.
  • Optical claim - We know designer frames can be pricey which is why we have included it as part of our coverage plan for you.
  • Food & Drinks - No one works well with an empty stomach. At Soft Space, we have bottomless drinks and endless array of snacks.
  • Parking claim - We understand driving around KL city can be quite expensive and daunting sometimes. We will bear half the cost of your monthly parking fee.
  • Cool Gears - Everyone gets the latest and greatest tech gear. You will also get your hands on the latest iOS, Android and Windows devices.
  • Company Trip & Teambuilding – Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.

Job Summary

Looking for the next step in your CAREER? Hytech Consulting has a current opening for an experienced JAVA Developer. Apply now to get started with us today! The Ideal JAVA Engineer will have 5 years or more of development experience and has a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Information System or equivalent.

Job responsibilities:

  • Responsible for independent module development tasks and system interface development;
  • Independently completed coding, unit testing and related documents according to the development specification and process.
  • Solve the problems existing in the system and ensure the stable operation of the system;

Job requirements:

  • Full-time college degree or above, major in computer software or related;
  • More than 3 years of solid development experience;
  • Proficient in Java virtual machine tuning and familiar with the memory management principle of Java virtual machine
  • Experiences in the current mainstream Java framework (Spring, Spring MVC, a Spring cloud, dubbo, zookeeper, Mybatis, Struts, Hibernate, etc.) the basic principle of.
  • Familiar with and equipped with two database systems such as oracle, mysql, sybase and db2, and have certain experience in SQL optimization;
  • Proficient in using Tomcat, WebLogic and other web application servers, and familiar with the server configuration principle; Familiar with the management and operation of an operating system (Linux).
  • Proficient in HTML, Css, Jquery,bootstrap and other web development technologies; familiar with Json, Xml and other data protocols; familiar with relevant caching technologies such as redis and memcache;
  • Experience in Internet finance is preferred.

What you can expect after join us?

Leadership – we offer a variety of leadership options to those who have interest, including becoming a team lead and managing releases.

Learning and development – we have a generous training development budget and encourage you to grow your skills through courses, books and conferences.

Architecture – we encourage you to develop expertise in the systems they work with, guide their evolution and mentor other developers working on them.

Engineering effectiveness – we believe in helping each other developers become more effective through tools, practices, cross-team collaborations, and process improvements.

Do this sound like you? If so, we’d love to hear from you.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Enhance cryptocurrency exchage using Java to meet design requirements as required by projects.

  • Prepare deployment and relevant documents

Job Requirement:

  • Well verse in Java JSP, javascript, html development
  • Added advantage if have experience in:- Blockchain, VueJS, SpringMVC, Spring, MyBatisDubbo, Zookeeper
  • self motivated and comfortable with rapid iteration
  • Demonstrate excellent problem solving and debugging skills
  • Able to work as part of an interdisciplinary, or on an individual level taking responsibility for self
  • Candidate must possess at least Higher Secondary/STPM/"A" Level/Pre-U, Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent.
  • Required language(s): English, Mandarin
  • At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Senior Executive specialized in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.
  • Preferable mandarin speaker.

Hands on knowledge & experience in the following:

o Git version control

o API 

o Reactjs

o Nodejs

o Java spring boot

o MongoDB/MySQL/SQL Query

o SQL/NOSQL

o Web services

Additional knowledge & experience in any of the following is a plus

o ELK

o Typescript

o Flutter

o Mobile hybrid frameworks

o Digital banking platform experience

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Develops software solutions by studying requirements analysis and information needs; studying systems flow, and work processes;
  • Performs software design using software development fundamentals and processes, debug, test, and deploy software solutions.
  • Design, develop and maintain key modules using well known JAVA IDE, Web and Service Technologies, and Frameworks.
  • Implementation of SharePoint-based workflows as well as development of Business Intelligence dashboards.
  • Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.
  • Actively participate in product design reviews by providing creative and practical ideas and solutions in a teamwork environment.
  • Prepare test based applications for various Java Applications; create technical specifications and test plans
  • Monitor everyday activities of system and provide require support; providing technical support for web, desktop or mobile applications
  • Develop and Integrate Application with Payment Gateway Module and other backend system.
  • Responsible for any changes on User Interface and JSF; Develop reports using reporting tools such as Jasper Reports
  • Support and Maintain Database; Create and map database tables and calling from Java code
  • Responsible for Bugs fixing, functionalities and requirement changes, and recommend work around.
  • Any other duties as assigned by the management.
  • Support presales team to present the demo to potential clients

Requirements and qualifications

  • Experience programming in Java, SQL, PLSQL; Possessed web technologies experience in Servets, JSP and JSF; Distributed Technologies experiences in RMI, EJB2.0 or latest;
  • Experience with Web server: Tomcat 5.0, 6.0; Application Server: WebLogic 8.0, JBoss, WAS7; ID: My Eclipse, Eclipse
  • 3 to 5 years of experience as a SharePoint Developer in the analysis, design, hands-on development and delivery of web-based applications.
  • Experience with Databases: Oracle, MS SQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
  • Experience with Java Application Framework on Struts, Spring and Hibernate; 
  • Degree in IT, Computer Science, MIS, or equivalent with programming experience
  • Must be motivated, independent and self-sufficient. Able to receive an assigned task and see it through to completion with minimal supervision.
  • Must have a strong programming background authoring well written, well documented, modular and clean code.
  • Must be well organized, a good communicator, able to effectively prioritize tasks, and manage your projects from concept to production.
  • Must be able to write thorough and concise functional and design specifications as well as easily readable end user documentation.
  • Must be well able to brainstorm with others, thrive in a collaborative team environment, multi task, and quickly adapt to change.
  • Must rely on project management experience and judgment to accomplish goals in a variety of tasks.
  • Must have excellent written and oral communication skills, and able to read and write in English.
  • Please indicate your expected salary when submitting your resume

Work location :- Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei Darussalam

Responsibilities 

  • Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
  • Write well designed, testable, efficient code
  • Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications
  • Prepare and produce releases of software components
  • Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review

Requirements

  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): Java, JBoss, Apache Tomcat, Spring, Eclipse IDE, Java/J2EE
  • Preferably Entry Level specialized in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.
  • Proven hands-on Software Development experience
  • Proven working experience in Java development
  • Hands on experience in designing and developing applications using Java EE platforms
  • Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.
  • Profound insight of Java and JEE internals (Classloading, Memory Management, Transaction management etc)
  • Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (Spring or Hibernate)
  • Knowledge in Cloud Environment such as CD/CI, MicroServices, Container as a service is a plus.

Career opportunity to involve in a new development project with Singapore Government ministry (large scale implementation):

  • New development project using Spring Boot framework & microservices technologies
  • Serve as a subject matter expert / advisor in Spring Boot
  • Cloud deployment exposure
  • Encourage work life balance with 5 days work week arrangement (hybrid)

Responsibilities:

  1. Work across the back-end development process to develop solutions
  2. Build and maintain high performance APIs accessible through mobile applications, web portals & partner services
  3. Deliver high-quality, secure, maintainable and testable code
  4. Collaborate with a cross-functional team of developers & designers to create services for public sector
  5. Participate in Scrum ceremonies such as Spring Planning, Review & Retrospective
  6. Maintain continuous integration & deployment pipelines to bring value to our users iteratively 

Requirements:

  • min. Degree in Computer Science or any relevant discipline
  • min. 4 years working experience in software development (focusing back-end or full-stack development)
  • Hands-on programming skills such as Java / Kotlin
  • Experience in Gradle, JPA, Spring Security, Spring Batch, SQL, etc
  • Experience in creation/maintenance of RESTFul APIs 
  • Experience in automation testing / unit testing

If you are interest in this opportunity, submit your application now to spvn(at)scientecpersonnel.com by indicating Job ID J40058 to fasten the process

Ng Kee Hung (Vickus) - R2091423

ScienTec Consulting Pte Ltd – 11C5781

SWIFT Customer Interaction tribe is looking for a Senior. Java Developer with knowledge in DevOps principles and methodologies, CI/CD automation, and a can-do attitude.

What to expect:

  • Design, develop, test, install and support application systems in line with product requirements.
  • Create, deploy and maintain end-to-end CI/CD pipelines ensuring the development and release of software is as seamless as possible.
  • Apply automation, monitoring and visualization across the architecture.
  • Work hand-in-hand with developers and testers to ensure code deploys and operates to the highest quality standards.
  • Analyze problems, develop and propose solutions to more senior team members.
  • Prepare and study the technical feasibility and estimates of the proposed systems solutions.
  • Develop and maintain technical documentation, prepare and give presentations to other team members, management and customers.
  • Provide coaching and training to more junior team members of your squad.
  • Provide timing/scheduling estimates to team leader and propose corrective actions to timelines when necessary.
  • Demonstrate customer centricity by working closely together with the internal customer.
  • Organize efficient handover through high quality documentation and training.
  • Collaborate with other engineers to innovate and implement the components of the design system.

What will make you successful:

  • University degree in Computer Science, Electronics, Information Systems, Business Administration or related field, or equivalent work experience.
  • 5-10 years of IT development experience (candidate with less experience can be considered as Developer)
  • 3+ years of experience in AEM Content Management (CMS)
  • Knowledge of various AEM components
  • Experience of creating OSGI bundle, CQ Components, Workflow
  • Knowledge Apache Sling
  • Solid programming/coding experience in Java EE 8 or newer, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Angular 2+, TypeScript & JavaScript
  • Solid understanding of Web technologies including HTML, CSS, AJAX, Web Services, SOAP, REST, Apache Tomcat and Apache HTTP Server.
  • Practical experience of Linux OS (RedHat Enterprise Linux)
  • Knowledge in DevOps and experience in branching strategies, continuous integration, testing, deployment, and monitoring. In an Agile environment that require a high degree of scalability and reliability
  • Knowledge in configuration management and software deployment orchestration using Ansible
  • Team player, ability to collaborate with teams operating in other time-zones (Europe and APAC)
  • Excellent written and verbal (English) communications, strong interpersonal skills and customer centric attitude.
  • Analytical with very good troubleshooting skills in understanding very complex situations and dependencies.
  • Eager to learn and to stay up to date with the latest technologies

Other technical skills:

  • Change management and continuous delivery pipeline tools: Confluence, Jira, Git, Jenkins, Service Now, Ansible Tower and Nexus.
  • Virtualization and containerization concepts and technologies is a plus (VMWARE/vSphere, Docker, OpenShift and/or Kubernetes)
  • Experience with public cloud (e.g., AWS, Azure) is seen as a big plus.
  • 1Ex0perience with monitoring tools (Logstash, filebeat, metricbeat, fluentd, Kibana) is seen as a big plus.

At ReTes we supply products from leading brands, manufacturers of energy management solutions, facilities maintenance, data analytics, alerts and monitoring system. We now have an opening for Senior Software Engineer.

Job Responsibilities: 

1.     Contribute in all phases of system development life cycle.

2.     Develop and maintain company’s web system front-end and back-end services. 

3.     Aware of latest development and updates of relevant frameworks and technologies. 

4.     Actively participate in providing ideas, suggestions and feedback to team and departmental meetings. 

5.     Able to prioritize and manage multiple responsibilities.

6.     Able to work independently with minimal guidance.

Job Requirements:

·        Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.

·        At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field especially web development.

·        Required skill(s): Understanding of programming paradigms such as OOP, MVC and ability to apply appropriate paradigm to solve business case.

·        Experienced in Laravel framework and JavaScript.

·        Familiar with app development (hybrid or native) and basic familiarity with Python and WordPress.

·        Proficient in databases design and normalization.

Benefits:

·        Annual Leave of at least 14 days per year

·        Medical Leave will be given according to Malaysia Labour Law

·        5 Working Days – Monday to Friday

·        Maternity/ Paternity Leave was given to F/ M candidates

·        Medical Benefit

·        Medical Insurance

·        Performance Bonus
